Please, use the following checklist to prepare the PR for being merged. Thanks!

- [ ] The commits are consistent with our [contribution guidelines](CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] You've added tests to cover your changes.
- [ ] You've updated the [changelog](../CHANGELOG.md) (only applies to user-visible changes)

*If you're just starting out to hack on nREPL you might find [Hacking on
nREPL](https:/nrepl.org/nrepl/hacking_on_nrepl.html) page extremely useful.*
